Package com.linecorp.centraldogma.client

Class CentralDogmaRepository

java.lang.Object
com.linecorp.centraldogma.client.CentralDogmaRepository
public final class CentralDogmaRepository
extends Object
Prepares to send requests to the Central Dogma repository.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    CommitRequest commit​(String summary, Change<?>... changes)
    Returns a new CommitRequest that is used to push the Changes to the Central Dogma repository.

    Returns a new CommitRequest that is used to push the Changes to the Central Dogma repository.

  • Method Details

    • normalize

      public CompletableFuture<Revision> normalize​(Revision revision)
      Converts the relative revision number to the absolute revision number. e.g. -1 -> 3
      Returns:
      the absolute Revision

    • file

      public FileRequest<?> file​(String path)
      Returns a new FileRequest that is used to retrieve the file in the Central Dogma repository. Call FileRequest.get(Revision) to perform the same operation as CentralDogma.getFile(String, String, Revision, Query).

    • file

      public <T> FileRequest<T> file​(Query<T> query)
      Returns a new FileRequest that is used to retrieve the file in the Central Dogma repository. Call FileRequest.get(Revision) to perform the same operation as CentralDogma.getFile(String, String, Revision, Query).

    • file

      public FilesRequest file​(PathPattern pathPattern)
      Returns a new FilesRequest that is used to retrieve or list files in the Central Dogma repository. Call FilesRequest.get(Revision) or FilesRequest.list(Revision) for those operation.

    • merge

      public MergeRequest<?> merge​(MergeSource... mergeSources)
      Returns a new MergeRequest that is used to retrieve the merged file in the Central Dogma repository. Call MergeRequest.get(Revision) to perform the same operation as CentralDogma.mergeFiles(String, String, Revision, MergeQuery).

    • merge

      public MergeRequest<?> merge​(Iterable<MergeSource> mergeSources)
      Returns a new MergeRequest that is used to retrieve the merged file in the Central Dogma repository. Call MergeRequest.get(Revision) to perform the same operation as CentralDogma.mergeFiles(String, String, Revision, MergeQuery).

    • merge

      public <T> MergeRequest<T> merge​(MergeQuery<T> mergeQuery)
      Returns a new MergeRequest that is used to retrieve the merged file in the Central Dogma repository. Call MergeRequest.get(Revision) to perform the same operation as CentralDogma.mergeFiles(String, String, Revision, MergeQuery).

    • history

      public HistoryRequest history()
      Returns a new HistoryRequest that is used to retrieve the history of all files in the Central Dogma repository. Call HistoryRequest.get(Revision, Revision) to perform the same operation as CentralDogma.getHistory(String, String, Revision, Revision, PathPattern, int).

    • history

      public HistoryRequest history​(PathPattern pathPattern)
      Returns a new HistoryRequest that is used to retrieve the history of files in the Central Dogma repository. Call HistoryRequest.get(Revision, Revision) to perform the same operation as CentralDogma.getHistory(String, String, Revision, Revision, PathPattern, int).

    • diff

      public DiffRequest<?> diff​(String path)
      Returns a new DiffRequest that is used to retrieve the diff of the file in the Central Dogma repository. Call DiffRequest.get(Revision, Revision) to perform the same operation as CentralDogma.getDiff(String, String, Revision, Revision, Query).

    • diff

      public <T> DiffRequest<T> diff​(Query<T> query)
      Returns a new DiffRequest that is used to retrieve the diff of the file in the Central Dogma repository. Call DiffRequest.get(Revision, Revision) to perform the same operation as CentralDogma.getDiff(String, String, Revision, Revision, Query).

    • diff

      public DiffFilesRequest diff​(PathPattern pathPattern)
      Returns a new DiffFilesRequest that is used to retrieve the diff of files in the Central Dogma repository. Call DiffFilesRequest.get(Revision, Revision) to perform the same operation as CentralDogma.getDiff(String, String, Revision, Revision, PathPattern).

    • diff

      public PreviewDiffRequest diff​(Change<?>... changes)
      Returns a new PreviewDiffRequest that is used to retrieve the preview diff of files in the Central Dogma repository. Call PreviewDiffRequest.get(Revision) to perform the same operation as CentralDogma.getPreviewDiffs(String, String, Revision, Iterable).

    • diff

      public PreviewDiffRequest diff​(Iterable<? extends Change<?>> changes)
      Returns a new PreviewDiffRequest that is used to retrieve the preview diff of files in the Central Dogma repository. Call PreviewDiffRequest.get(Revision) to perform the same operation as CentralDogma.getPreviewDiffs(String, String, Revision, Iterable).

    • commit

      public CommitRequest commit​(String summary, Change<?>... changes)
      Returns a new CommitRequest that is used to push the Changes to the Central Dogma repository. Call CommitRequest.push(Revision) to perform the same operation as CentralDogma.push(String, String, Revision, String, String, Markup, Iterable).

    • commit

      public CommitRequest commit​(String summary, Iterable<? extends Change<?>> changes)
      Returns a new CommitRequest that is used to push the Changes to the Central Dogma repository. Call CommitRequest.push(Revision) to perform the same operation as CentralDogma.push(String, String, Revision, String, String, Markup, Iterable).

    • watch

      public WatchRequest<?> watch​(String path)
      Returns a new WatchRequest that is used to watch the file in the Central Dogma repository. Call WatchRequest.start(Revision) to perform the same operation as CentralDogma.watchFile(String, String, Revision, Query, long, boolean).

    • watch

      public <T> WatchRequest<T> watch​(Query<T> query)
      Returns a new WatchRequest that is used to watch the file in the Central Dogma repository. Call WatchRequest.start(Revision) to perform the same operation as CentralDogma.watchFile(String, String, Revision, Query, long, boolean).

    • watch

      public WatchFilesRequest watch​(PathPattern pathPattern)
      Returns a new WatchFilesRequest that is used to watch the files in the Central Dogma repository. Call WatchFilesRequest.start(Revision) to perform the same operation as CentralDogma.watchRepository(String, String, Revision, PathPattern, long, boolean).

    • watcher

      public <T> WatcherRequest<T> watcher​(Query<T> query)
      Returns a new WatcherRequest that is used to create a Watcher.

    • watcher

      public WatcherRequest<Revision> watcher​(PathPattern pathPattern)
      Returns a new WatcherRequest that is used to create a Watcher.
